snippet: Wes Anderson’s latest film, “The Grand Budapest Hotel,” while set in an imaginary country, conjures a refined prewar Europe threatened by imminent global conflict.
abstract: Wes Anderson’s latest film, The Grand Budapest Hotel, conjures up refined prewar Europe threatened by imminent global conflict, even if it is set in imaginary country; film, perhaps more so than Anderson’s seven others, offers his most personal invitation yet into his world, as well as thoughts and feelings that shape it.
lead_paragraph: Wes Anderson’s latest film, “The Grand Budapest Hotel,” while set in an imaginary country, conjures a refined prewar Europe threatened by imminent global conflict.

headline.seo: Wes Anderson Evokes Nostalgia in ‘The Grand Budapest Hotel’
headline.main: Casting Shadows on a Fanciful World
headline.print_headline: Casting Shadows on a Fanciful World
